customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text: The player can teleport to the nearest waypoint

Going to Verna starts the dialogue
Quest Objective: Talk to Verna
Quest Objective: Throw fragment(s) to open the sealed sanctum
Quest Objective: Talk to Verna
Quest Objective: Follow the track
Go and talk to Verna
Throw the fragment at the rock
Enter Empowered State using the nearby plant affected by Kuuvahki.
Interact with the fragment.
Interact with the rock to throw the fragment at it.
Then, after talking to Verna, use the Kuuvahki to use Moonlane

Quest Objective: Unlock the mechanism seal
Use Moonlane to unlock the seal
Go to the red Kuuhenki to enter Empowered State
Go to any side of the ring that the player is inside and use the Moonlane.
Each time the Kuuvahki button appears, use it to go to the outer rings and unlock the seal.

Quest Objective: Talk to Verna
Quest Objective: Enter the Court of the First Edict
Quest Objective: Investigate the Court of the First Edict
Quest Objective: Follow the Moonlane
Quest Objective: Investigate the Court of the First Edict
After talking to Verna, enter the entrance of the Court of the First Edict
Then, go near the pond and investigate it
Use the Kuuvahki to use the Moonlane

Quest Objective: Investigate the sword Aila left behind
Go to the pool
The player can use Moonlane or glide down to the pool
After this objective, the player can walk to the sword (

customize.name: Moonweaver's Dawn
customize.desc: An immaculate, sharp silver sword that can slice through armor like moonlight flowing through the empty night. According to legend, it is a divine blade, blessed by the first Moonchanter herself.

customize.text: ) floating above the pool and obtain it.

Quest Objective: Exit the Court of the First Edict
Quest Objective: Talk to Verna

The player will receive "The Weaver in the Ossuary" achievement after completing this quest.
<color=#ffd780>Achievement Category - Nod-Krai: An Elysium of Moonlight and Wanderings (I)</color>
<color=#ffffff>The Weaver in the Ossuary</color>
Explore the sanctum sealed off by the first Moonchanter.
